page.title: 05Climate
page.content: ECOLOGY IN THE DELABOLE AREA. { Our weather(2).}By Rachel Davey. {WIND. In Delabole we always have a bit of wind even if only a breeze.Most of the time its SW or NW.We only have easterly winds in the Winter and Spring.Through the years we have had 14 days in 1981 with gail force,10 days in 1982,13 days in 1983 and 13 days in 1984.So the Average number of days we have gail force winds each year is 10 days. We do have quite a few days with{sea mist,}because we are near the coast and high up. {RAIN. We have rain every month in Delabole. We have had a dry summer for the last two years.The average rain for a year is 183 cm.In a year for an average it is 164 days with some rain.
